trans-unit.source: Defines mouse events.
trans-unit.target: 定義滑鼠事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DragDrop" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDropTarget.OnDragDrop%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDropTarget.OnDragDrop%2A> 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.IDropTarget.OnDragDrop(System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.IDropTarget.OnDragDrop(System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在覆寫<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.IDropTarget.OnDragDrop(System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs)" />在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.IDropTarget.OnDragDrop(System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs)" />方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DragEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。
